definitions.definition: In which the value of a data item (such as time) is represented by a continuous (ly) variable physical quantity that can be measured (such as the shadow of a sundial).
Not relating to, or pre-dating, digital technology such as computers and the Internet ; relating to real life .

main_definition: ( of a device or system ) In which the value of a data item (such as time) is represented by a continuous (ly) variable physical quantity that can be measured (such as the shadow of a sundial).
secondary_definitions: Not relating to, or pre-dating, digital technology such as computers and the Internet ; relating to real life .
